description: A ptopoConfigChange notification is sent when the value of
ptopoLastChangeTime changes. It can be utilized by an NMS to
trigger physical topology table maintenance polls.
Note that transmission of ptopoConfigChange notifications
are throttled by the agent, as specified by the

event.Summary: NMS detected a change in configuration of physical topology table

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PTOPO-MIB::ptopoConfigChange PTOPO-MIB::ptopoConnTabInserts c 9999 PTOPO-MIB::ptopoConnTabDeletes c 9999 PTOPO-MIB::ptopoConnTabDrops c 9999 PTOPO-MIB::ptopoConnTabAgeouts c 9999

variables.name: PTOPO-MIB::ptopoConnTabDeletes

topology protocol), but was not because of insufficient
variables.name: PTOPO-MIB::ptopoConnTabDrops

description: The number of times an entry has been deleted from the

variables.name: PTOPO-MIB::ptopoConnTabAgeouts
